TopicTitle: NearFutureLaunchVehicles adapters decoupling for some reason.

Articles.Content:
Not sure why but the adapters from NearFutureLaunchVehicles are decoupling apon engine activation.

Heres a link to a google drive with the craft file this issue is occuring in, and the CKAN modpack file.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1uTFZV84XG33v4HDRUa4gU6HlTYE8InV0?usp=sharing

Would be very nice if you manged to fix it!
